detachmentRule.name: Terror Descends (Aura)
detachmentRule.lore: Saturated by the Eye of Terror and bearing the taint of the warp, these warriors sow dread and havoc as they advance. Enemies who witness their coming are gripped by paralyzing fear, making them easier targets for the Heretic Astartes' deadly assaults.
detachmentRule.description:
While an enemy unit is within 6" of one or more HERETIC ASTARTES units from your army:
- Subtract 1 from Combat Attrition tests taken for that unit.
- Each time a model in that unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.
Each time an enemy unit within 6" of one or more HERETIC ASTARTES units from your army fails a Battle-shock test, subtract 1 from its Objective Control characteristic (to a minimum of 0) until the start of your next Command phase.

enhacements.name: Night's Shroud
enhacements.lore: This cloak is as black as a moonless night and radiates an all-enveloping aura of impenetrable darkness.
enhacements.description: CHAOS LORD model only (excluding TERMINATOR models). Models in the bearer’s unit have the Stealth ability.

enhacements.name: Willbreaker
enhacements.lore: This daemonic weapon assists the psyches of those it strikes, causing ripples of abject terror to grip their victim’s minds.
enhacements.description: HERETIC ASTARTES model only. In the Fight phase, after the bearer has resolved its attacks, select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of the bearer’s unit. That unit must take a Battle-shock test.

enhacements.name: Warp-fuelled Thrusters
enhacements.lore: Bound with warp energies, this Lord’s jump pack propels him to unnatural heights, allowing him to withdraw at a moment’s notice.
enhacements.description: JUMP PACK CHAOS LORD model only. At the end of your opponent’s turn, if the bearer is not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, you can remove the bearer from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

enhacements.name: Eater of Dread
enhacements.lore: As trophies of terror spread through the ranks of the enemy, this champion draws power from the fear his very presence inspires.
enhacements.description: HERETIC ASTARTES model only. At the start of your Command phase, if the bearer is on the battlefield, roll one D6, adding 1 to the result for each enemy unit within 12" of the bearer: on a 5+, you gain 1CP.

stratagems.name: Depthless Cruelty
stratagems.lore: Heretic Astartes strike with visceral precision upon those they consider weak, slaughtering the vulnerable with merciless efficiency.
stratagems.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a unit that is Battle-Shocked and/or Below Half-strength, improve the Armour Penetration of that attack by 1

stratagems.name: Bloody Example
stratagems.lore: The violent and bloody slaughter of the enemy's leadership hurls their followers into abject panic
stratagems.when: Fight phase, just after a Heretic Astartes unit from your army destroys a CHARACTER unit
stratagems.effect: Each enemy unit within 12'' of and visible to your unit mus ttake a Battle-shock test

stratagems.name: Pitiless Hunters
stratagems.lore: These remorseless killers systematically exterminate the fleeing survivors, leaving none to tell the tale.
stratagems.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets an enemy unit that is below Half-strength, you can re-roll the Hit roll. Each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets an enemy unit that is Battle-shocked, you can re-roll the Wound roll.

stratagems.name: Relentless Terror
stratagems.lore: These warriors strike in screaming waves, each charge as brutal as the last.
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase, just after a Heretic Astartes Infantry unit from your army Falls Back.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

stratagems.name: Screaming Descent
stratagems.lore: Jump pack borne warriors descend from the skies, terrifying screams emanating from their vox-grilles as they plummet towards their prey.
stratagems.when: Reinforcements step of your Movement phase, from the second battle round onwards.
stratagems.target: One Heretic Astartes Jump Pack unit from your army that is in Reserves.
stratagems.effect: Set your unit up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 3" horizontally away from all enemy units, but until the end of the turn, it is not eligible to declare a charge. Then select one enemy Infantry or Mounted unit within 6" of and visible to your unit: that unit must take a Battle-shock test.

stratagems.name: Merciless Pursuit
stratagems.lore: The Heretic Astartes allow none to flee the battle, pursuing their broken foes with relentless savagery.
stratagems.when: End of your opponent’s Movement phase.
stratagems.target: One Heretic Astartes Infantry unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
stratagems.effect: Select one enemy unit that Fell Back this turn and is within 6" of your unit. Your unit can declare a charge as if it were your Charge phase. When doing so, you can only select that enemy unit as the target of that charge (and only if it is an eligible target). Note that even if this charge is successful, your unit does not receive any Charge bonus this turn.
